Bug_report.Project_name: Web-site of online Store Litecart, http://litecart.stqa.ru
Bug_report.Summary: [Regional Settings] Pop up - no possibility to choose another language
Bug_report.Steps_to_reproduce: Open main page. Click [Change] Button in Regional settings section in header. Select language from [Language] Listbox
Bug_report.Actual_result: No other languages can be selected from the [Language] Listbox
Bug_report.Expected_result: Other languages can be selected from the [Language] Listbox
